summary:
Experienced Intellectual Property Jurist. Assist photographers and artists with drafting and negotiating contracts and enforcing copyright law. Well versed in the Dutch artist renumeration directive. 2021 Graduate of the Martens Academy, a specialisation course for experienced jurists and lawyers of intellectual property.
Experienced Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the law practice industry, health care, post-conflict areas as well as in renewable energy. Skilled in Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs), Capacity Building, and Government. Strong administrative and managerial professional with Master's degrees in Public International Law and Political Science from University of Amsterdam as well as a Bachelor's degree in Business administration /Economics. Extended working experience in Asia and West Africa.
